products.name: Brads Nintendo Switch Left and Right Joy-Con Controllers - The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword HD
products.shortDescription: Dive into the immersive world The Legend of Zelda with these specially designed Joy-Con controllers for the Nintendo Switch system. Great for at home or on-the-go gaming, these controllers make it easy to bring your games with you anywhere you go. Use them independently in each hand, or together as one game controller by attaching them to the Joy-Con grip.

products.name: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening (Switch)
products.shortDescription: Go on an incredible journey with Link in The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening for Nintendo Switch. After Link washes ashore on a mysterious island, he must collect magical instruments across the land and awaken the Wind Fish. Along the way, he'll explore the island, meet its colourful inhabitants, collect treasure, and dodge monsters.

products.name: The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword HD (Switch)
products.shortDescription: Experience the earliest story in Link's quest in stunning HD with The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword HD for Nintendo Switch. Soar above the clouds and descend to the treacherous surface with Link as he embarks on an epic journey to save his childhood friend, Zelda. Your Joy-Con can function as your sword, while there's also a button-only control scheme for handheld mode or on Switch Lite.

products.name: amiibo The Legend of Zelda - Zelda & Loftwing
products.shortDescription: Embark on new adventures with your favorite Nintendo characters with this Zelda & Loftwing amiibo figure. This amiibo accessory adds a cool character and endless fun to your game. Tap the figure on the NFC touchpoint on a compatible system to score new characters, enjoy fun in-game extra features in compatible games on the Nintendo Switch.

products.name: Nintendo Game & Watch: The Legend of Zelda System
products.shortDescription: Relive a three classic titles in a cool, retro-throwback package with this Nintendo Game & Watch: The Legend of Zelda system. It includes The Legend of Zelda titles, including The Legend of Zelda, Zelda II: The Adventure of Link, and The Legend of Zelda: Link’s Awakening, plus Vermin, a Game & Watch classic title that stars Link, along with a playable clock and timer.

products.name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild (Switch)
products.shortDescription: Experience the Kingdom of Hyrule like never before in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild for Nintendo Switch. After Link wakes up from a 100-year slumber, he must explore the land he no longer remembers, travel through the open-air world, collect weaponry for combat, and strive to regain his memories.

products.name: RDS Zelda Travel Case Bundle for Nintendo Switch & Switch Lite
products.shortDescription: Secure and organised, this Zelda travel case bundle from RDS offers easy portability and adjustable viewing for your Nintendo Switch or Nintendo Switch Lite. A pair of smaller storage cases fit neatly under the Switch to carry up to 4 game cards and 2 microSD cards. The included screen protector and soft cleaning cloth make it easy to keep the screen looking like new.

products.name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - Switch Edition
products.shortDescription: No kingdom. No memories. After a 100-year slumber, Link wakes up alone in a world he no longer remembers. Now the legendary hero must explore a vast and dangerous land and regain his memories before Hyrule is lost forever. Armed only with what he can scavenge, Link sets out to find answers and the resources needed to survive. Supported play modes: TV mode, tabletop mode and handheld mode.

products.shortDescription: Take your Nintendo Switch on all your adventures with the PowerA Legend of Zelda protection case kit. Featuring a Legend of Zelda-inspired design and a standard button layout, it comes with a detachable 10-foot USB cable and lets you play your favourite titles. The included hook-and-loop fastener strap reduces cable clutter when you're done playing.

products.name: The Legend of Zelda: Links Awakening
products.shortDescription: Link has washed ashore on a mysterious island with strange and colorful inhabitants. To escape the island, Link must collect magical instruments across the land and awaken the Wind Fish. Explore a reimagined Koholint Island that’s been faithfully rebuilt in a brand-new art style that will entice fans and newcomers alike. Battle enemies as you conquer numerous dungeons and uncover the hidden secrets of the island.

products.name: Nintendo Selects: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask (3DS) - Digital Download
products.shortDescription: Experience one of Nintendo’s most suspenseful apocalyptic adventures ever in The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask on Nintendo 3DS. The land of Termina will meet with a terrible fate in 3 days when the moon falls. To save Termina you'll relive the world’s final 72 hours, solve elaborate puzzles, conquer dungeons, battle giant bosses, and more.
